correctness.rationale: The extraction is largely ungrounded in the article and contains multiple schema violations. Key issues: (1) Reactants and method: Article explicitly states O2 (and a comparison with O2 plasma) was used as oxidant during IGZO ALD to avoid hydrogen effects, but the extraction sets H2O as co-reactant for all sub-oxides and labels all sub-processes as TALD; this contradicts the text indicating O2 plasma (PEALD) vs O2 (thermal) was evaluated. (2) Precursors: The article does not specify the exact metal precursors; the provided TMI/TMGa/DMZn list is not traceable to the text. (3) Process parameters: Reactor name, substrate (“Si wafer”), delivery method, temperature (200 °C), pressure (0.1 mTorr), dosing/purge times, and flow rates are all unstated in the article; values appear invented. (4) Supercycle design and composition: The article discusses tuning the cycle ratio and selecting an optimized ratio (numbers redacted/garbled), but the extraction fixes an unsubstantiated 1:1:1 ratio and count=1 for each subcycle; not traceable. (5) Material properties: Optical (n, absorption, bandgap), electrical (resistivity, carrier density, mobility), roughness, density, composition (1:1:1), and amorphous phase are not reported with these values in the article; these numbers are unsupported. (6) Device properties: The device is a vertical channel-all-around IGZO TFT; declaring deviceStructure as “bottom-gate top-contact” and assigning Vth=0 V, SS=100 mV/dec, μ=10 cm2/Vs, ION/IOFF=1e6 is not supported by the text. (7) Schema violations: plasmaPower is set to null though the schema requires an object if present; absorptionCoefficient unit uses PER-CENTI-M whereas the schema restricts to UNITLESS; thicknessControl is malformed (numberofCycles and filmThickness are incorrectly nested inside growthPerCycle, and filmThickness is also added at the processParameters root where it is not defined). (8) Traceability: Many fields (carrier/purging gas N2, growth per cycle 0.1 Å, total cycles 100, film thickness 10 nm, etc.) are not verifiable from the provided text. Properties to correct/review: coReactant and ALD method per compound; all precursor identities; reactor/substrate/temperature/pressure/dose-purge-flow values; supercycle counts/sequence and atomic ratios; all material and device property values; schema conformance for plasmaPower, absorptionCoefficient unit, and thicknessControl structure.

completeness.rationale: The extracted record is largely ungrounded in (and often contradicts) the article and shows schema issues. Key problems: (1) Oxidant/co‑reactant is wrong: the paper explicitly compares O2 plasma vs O2 and then uses O2 to avoid H effects; the JSON sets H2O for all sub‑oxides. (2) Many parameters are fabricated/not traceable: reactor make/model, substrate (Si wafer), temperature (200 °C), pressure, growth‑per‑cycle (0.1 Å), dosing/purge times (1 ms), flow rates (10 sccm/100 sccm), cycle counts, film thickness, and supercycle counts/ratios (set to 1:1:1) are not reported in the text provided. (3) Supercycle design is central in the article (cycle ratio [x:y:z] and N supercycles), but the extraction neither captures the reported ratios nor the oxidant variants; only one process is provided despite the article describing at least two (O2 vs O2 plasma) and multiple ratios. (4) Material properties (refractive index, band gap, resistivity, carrier density, mobility, roughness, density, uniformity, conformality) and composition (XPS, 1:1:1 ratio) are not supported by the article; the paper shows EDS elemental mapping and TEM, not XPS or XRD. (5) Device metrics (μFE, VTH, SS, ION/IOFF) are given as generic numbers without citation from the figures; the paper discusses VTH shifts under PBS and after annealing, not the fixed values reported. (6) Schema issues: plasmaPower is null (should be omitted if not used); absorptionCoefficient unit is PER-CENTI-M but the schema restricts to UNITLESS; duplicative filmThickness appears both inside thicknessControl and at processParameters level; many values are unverified. To improve, replace coReactant with O2 (and add a PEALD variant for O2 plasma as a separate process), provide the actual cycle ratio(s) and number of supercycles N, include the chosen oxidant and any plasma power if applicable, and only populate parameters and device/material properties that are explicitly reported (e.g., VTH shift, stress conditions, anneal conditions, EDS/TEM-based findings).
